name: data-visualization-gbd2013
description: A visualization of data in the Global Burden of Disease Study 2013.

scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] client/src/app.jsx -o client/public/bundle.js && cp node_modules/papaparse/papaparse.min.js client/public/

author: David E. Schneider
